name: Talk_Anna
_source: speak;Anna;Welcome to the Dragon's Gate!|Here, you can experience Paralogues, new events, and more!|Unfortunately, the creator is busy, and doesn't have any new content yet...

speak;Anna;If you'd like, though, I have something that may interest you!|This is an Einherjar card!|It's a custom one to boot!|If you want, we can add a new unit to your army of your own choosing!|Shall we make you one?
speak;Anna;And there we go!|Let's go summon our new friend!

speak;Anna;Perfect!|I hope you enjoy your new unit!|This soldier is special!|Every 5th and 15th level, you can choose a random class skill for them to learn!|These choices are randomized!|I hope you get lucky!
speak;Anna;Oh!|I almost forgot!|You'd better give your new soldier a name!
speak;Anna;{v:MyUnitName}!|An interesting choice!|Well, that's all I've got for now!|Please look forward to any new releases!
speak;Anna;Unfortunately, that's all I have for you for now.|Please come back another day once the creator makes more content!
speak;Anna;Unfortunately, that's all I have for you for now.|Please come back another day once the creator makes more content!
speak;Anna;Unfortunately, that's all I have for you for now.|Please come back another day once the creator makes more content!
